author: Cristiano Lima
title: Twitter: Laura Ingraham tweet broke rules against coronavirus misinformation
description: Ingraham tweeted praise for hydroxychloroquine, an anti-malaria drug championed by the president as a potential treatment for the virus.
content:
Fox News host Laura Ingraham. | Mark J. Terrill, File/AP Photo
Fox News host Laura Ingraham has deleted a tweet touting an unproven coronavirus treatment that a Twitter spokesperson said today ran afoul of its rules against misleading health information.
